Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the village of Weedsport
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax of seven percent of the per diem rental rate of hotel rooms in the village of Weedsport, county of Cayuga.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Weedsport; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
